text: tomorrow is my birthday  i don t want it Tomorrow I turn   and have nothing to show for it  Not in the material sense  Not in the cosmic sense  In no sense at all  I was was watching this television show and a scene hit me hard  The two characters were talking about existence and one says  I m paraphrasing   if the life you envision in your dreams isn t beautiful  then why are you alive  In that moment everything clicked  When I close my eyes and dream  I cannot even envision a beautiful future  How can I go on knowing that even in my imagination there is no peace or hope for me  I know I m some nobody woman to you all but I wanted to write some of these last thoughts on how to not end up like me  On how to be a better person don t let fear run your life respect yourself enough to not stick around for people who don t care about you if you have a passion  pursue it with everything  it should be scary not comfortable work towards your goals  I had a dream to live in new york city when I was   Had I worked towards this  I d be there today  Instead I didn t  and I m stuck in some  town in the middle of nowhere I hope you all lead better lives  For what it s worth  I became an organ donor recently  so hopefully I can at least do one thing good in my absence

text: I m done with life I just wanted to put this here to make sure my parents know I loved them and it was never their fault  If I ever blamed them  or seemed like I did  I m sorry  I wish I could make it up to them and I had plans for a future where I could  but the pandemic just took that away  It s not in anyone s control  It s okay   I hope everyone who reads this goes on to do things that I never will  Maybe  and probably  you already have  I can t take a whole life of sitting in my room watching everything and everyone pass me by  I tried to be a part of normal life  but it just wasn t  for me  I m sure I could have done more  said no when it mattered and maybe I would have a happy life  or just one worth living  but there s no point to regret anymore  I never did anything bad or hurt anyone and I like to think that I made some people happy while I was here  I hope of anyone has memories of me  they re good ones  or they re in passing  I d like it to be that way and I think it will be   If I was to weak to do the important work when it mattered the most for doing this  that s okay  I was never a very strong person and that s fine  Everyone has their strengths and weaknesses  Maybe my life could have gotten better  but just understand that I couldn t let it get any worse anymore   If you re just reading this sub because you are curious or for disturbing content  if you still think your life is worth living  please just don t let fear stop you  I ve ruined my life because I was so scared of everything and put myself into a situation where this is my only option  I hope you re not there  and if you aren t  go outside and put the middle finger in life s face  There s nothing worth being scared over  If you re going to live  do it fearlessly and make it worth sticking around for
summary: I'm done with life. I wish I could have done more for my parents but the pandemic took that away. I never did anything bad or hurt anyone and I like to think I made some people happy while I was here. I was scared of everything and put myself into a situation where this is my only option.
cleaned: life wish parent pandemic take away bad hurt like think people happy scared situation option
